milestones.title: GridPane Auth Working
milestones.details: GridPane API authentication successfully working. Data syncing from GridPane API and storing in Convex database.

milestones.title: Data Displaying in Tables
milestones.details: All 4 resource tables (Servers, Web Services, Domains, Databases) integrated and displaying real-time data from Convex queries.

activeMissions.title: UI Polish + Multi-Provider Integration → Beacons Extraction

milestones.title: UI Tables Polished
milestones.details: Fix table bugs and align with template. All 4 tables (servers, webServices, domains, databases) visually match template and functionally working. Frontend review document created with specific fixes identified. Making meaningful improvements.

milestones.title: 8+ Providers Integrated
milestones.details: Add 11 providers (Vercel, Netlify, Cloudflare, DNSimple, DigitalOcean, Vultr, Linode, AWS, GCP, Azure, Rocket.net) with GET endpoints only for hackathon MVP.

milestones.title: Beacons Extraction Ready
milestones.details: Extraction guide complete, codebase prepared for clean extraction to Beacons (independent repo). RBAC + encryption + universal translation layer ready.

completedMissions.title: Repo-Wide Documentation Update
completedMissions.summary: Updated all documentation links, references, and paths to reflect new monorepo structure (packages/ui, packages/docks, packages/cli)

completedMissions.title: Repo Lockdown
completedMissions.summary: GitHub branch protection configured with owner bypass. PR requirements set (1 approval, stale review dismissal). Functionally complete for solo contributor. Step 4 (verification tests) deferred as non-blocker.

deferredSteps.title: Verify Owner Bypass
deferredSteps.reason: Solo contributor - verification tests can be done when contributors join

completedMissions.title: SST Core → StackDock Core Refactoring
completedMissions.summary: All provisioning infrastructure implemented: schema changes, audit logging, SST core engine, provisioning mutations, CLI designs, frontend UI, status queries, credential rotation, security documentation, and frontend integration. Core functionality complete. Testing phase recommended.

blockers.title: TypeScript Errors Blocking Convex Dev Server
blockers.resolution: All 20 TypeScript errors fixed. Convex dev server starts successfully. Static imports replaced dynamic imports. Type guards added for proper type narrowing. Index queries corrected.

notes: Captain and AI Assistant are the brains. Captain controls agents. Main branch is sacred - owner holds the only key.
